name: Elixir of Enlightenment
description:
You are a Professor of Social Anthropology. In your current research you have come across an ancient manuscript mentioning a mysterious cave, in which a recipe for the Elixir of Enlightenment is hidden. Although not difficult to find, the cave cannot be entered. The source says it takes a pure heart and an open mind to break the invisible lock...

Features
  • explore picturesque landscapes
  • gather, examine and combine items to solve the riddle of the cave
  • seemingly light and playful, yet packed with meaning and insight
  • optional object highlighting hints
  • beautiful, relaxing soundtrack
  • no ads or in-app purchases
